Pre-Game Insights: England have won their last seven T20Is against Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka have not beaten England since 2014.
England have showcased some excellent bowling variety with Sam Curran, Mark Wood, and Ben Stokes.
Sri Lanka have a superior contingent of spinners, while England's quicks know how to take the pace off the ball.
Adil Rashid has struggled for wickets in this tournament but has a good record against Sri Lanka.
Lahiru Kumara has improved as a bowler but may face a serious test from England's batters.
